name: billboard_global_200_year_end
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Provide the YEAR-END Billboard Global 200 chart information

If `year` is not supplied, will default to last year.

year.description: The year for which to fetch the chart data, in the format 'YYYY'. Defaults to '2022'.
